mapper.select: SELECT A.idx, A.id, A.name, A.email, A.phone, A.tel, B.name AS dept, D.name AS parentDept, C.name AS role, A.state, A.allowed_ip, E.file_name AS profileImageName, E.file_path AS profileImagePath, DATE_FORMAT(A.join_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), A.login_failure_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(A.withdrawal_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(A.last_login_date, '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d'), A.created_by, DATE_FORMAT(A.updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d'), A.updated_by FROM admin A JOIN dept B ON A.dept_idx = B.idx JOIN role C ON A.role_idx = C.idx LEFT JOIN dept D ON D.idx = B.parent_idx LEFT JOIN attachment E ON E.idx = A.profile_image_idx WHERE A.idx = #{adminIdx}
SELECT B.idx, B.name FROM admin_channel A JOIN channel B ON B.idx = A.channel_idx WHERE A.admin_idx = #{adminIdx}
